mapper.select: select count(*) FROM MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.FMI = fmi.code AND rmc.SPN = spn.code
select count(*) FROM MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.FMI = fmi.code AND rmc.SPN = spn.code AND car_id = ${car_id}

select rmc.time, rmc.car_id, rmc.FMI, fmi.name_kr as FMI_NAME, rmc.SPN, spn.description_kr as SPN_DESCRIPTION, rmc.DTC, rmc.CM, rmc.DRIVE_SPEED, rmc.OC, rmc.RPM, rmc.GPS_LAT, rmc.GPS_LONG from MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.SPN = spn.code AND rmc.FMI = fmi.code group by car_id order by time desc limit #{listSize} offset #{offset}

select date_format(time, '%Y%m%d') as date, count(*) as count from MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.SPN = spn.code AND rmc.FMI = fmi.code group by date_format(time, '%Y%m%d') order by date desc limit 7

select date_format(time, '%Y%m%d') as date, count(*) as count from MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.SPN = spn.code AND rmc.FMI = fmi.code group by date_format(time, '%Y%m%d') order by date desc limit 7 offset 7

select rmc.time, rmc.car_id, rmc.FMI, fmi.name_kr as FMI_NAME, rmc.SPN, spn.description_kr as SPN_DESCRIPTION, rmc.DTC, rmc.CM, rmc.DRIVE_SPEED, rmc.OC, rmc.RPM, rmc.GPS_LAT, rmc.GPS_LONG from MAIN_RMC as rmc, SPN_CODE as spn, FMI_CODE as fmi where rmc.SPN = spn.code AND rmc.FMI = fmi.code AND rmc.car_id = #{car_id} order by time desc limit #{listSize} offset #{offset}
